name: Yoink the Gem
description:
! RUN IN FULLSCREEN !

It was kind of a spontaneous decision to join this game jam, but hey, game jams are fun.

Even though my time was way longer than three hours, I still enjoyed it.

To self reflect:

I am not happy with the sounds. But since most of my games are silent, I guess... progress? The graphics... eh... I spent too long trying to make an emissive material for 2D, but no luck... maybe next time. Otherwise... whatever, it's just a game jam game ':D 

Even though it is not part of my Modding Playground collection, I did try to make everything open.

Third-party assets used:

  • Pixellari font by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante (https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font)
  • DOTween by Demigiant (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/1341)
  • Sounds by Sidearm Studios (it looks like they are no longer on asset store)
